name: Bake Agency
description: Bake Agency is a communication agency based in Rome specializing in marketing, advertising, and creative services. They focus on delivering quality projects with passion, interpreting client visions, and providing comprehensive digital communication strategies.

services.name: Branding
services.details: Brand strategy, Restyling, Naming & Payoff, Logo design, Brand manual. Creating a recognizable image to differentiate from competitors.

services.name: Digital Marketing
services.details: SEO, Social Media Marketing, Email Marketing, Market and user analysis. Tailored digital marketing strategies to reach target audiences.

services.name: Digital Advertising
services.details: Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, Spotify Ads, Promotional campaigns, Google Tag Manager. Personalized and measurable online advertising campaigns.

services.name: Social Media Management
services.details: Editorial planning, Social channel management, Content creation, Sponsored posts. Managing social media to achieve client goals.

services.name: Copywriting
services.details: Article writing, Website copy, Social post copy, Keyword analysis, SEO. Crafting marketing-oriented texts to engage customers.

services.name: Brand Identity
services.details: Graphic design, Logos, Brochures, Business cards, Gadgets, 3D animation, Packaging. Creating a strong visual identity for brands.

services.name: Websites
services.details: Showcase sites, E-commerce, Blogs, Landing pages, News sites, GDPR compliance. Custom websites reflecting client vision and usability.

services.name: Photo & Video
services.details: Photo shoots, Spots, Animations, Promotional videos. Professional visual content to engage audiences.

services.name: PR & Events
services.details: Digital PR, Radio, Press, TV, Online sites, Brand reputation management. Initiatives and content to enhance brand image.

vision: Bake Agency is committed to quality work, interpreting client visions with passion and delivering projects that balance creativity and precision. Their manifesto emphasizes trust in brand building, the importance of digital communication, and exploring the full potential of communication to help brands express themselves and achieve their goals. They operate primarily from Rome with a network of professionals.
